Name: Bootybuns 2
About the game: This time your opponent has a girlfriend with her! Play 21 against the sexy cosplayer & her girlfriend. And this time on winning, your opponent will turn to the ‘book of sexy forfeits’ to decide what her forfeit should be to buy back in! Forfeits include acts such as being spanked, or kissing her girlfriend… Or perhaps a session of down on her knees to suck a special treat! Features Multiple sexy forfeits to unlock Colourful stylised 3D artwork Many hours of gameplay Side by side 3d mode (you will need suitable TV/ monitor to enjoy effect)
